text:
CardioLogs | Paris, France | ONSITE | Full-time | Front-End Engineer

http://cardiologs.com/

ABOUT US

CardioLogs Technologies is a startup created in 2014 at the interface between Health and Big Data industries. We develop and commercialise medical diagnostic support tools to health professionals. Our mission is to build an artificial intelligence able to detect cardiovascular diseases on electrocardiograms, to facilitate the diagnosis of patients.

Our stack includes Ruby on Rails, AngularJS, D3, PostgreSQL, Docker, AWS, git.

POSITION

We are looking for a front-end engineer to work on the tools that will be used by doctors to diagnose their patients. These tools are web applications developed using JavaScript / AngularJS and D3.

For more info, contact me at romain@cardiologs.com.
